STR.name: Strength
mechanics: Primary modifier for Melee Attack Bonus and Damage.
Used for physical checks like forcing doors or resisting shoves.

DEX.name: Dexterity
DEX.description: Hand-eye coordination, quickness, and manual skill.
mechanics: Primary modifier for Ranged Attack Bonus and Damage.
Contributes to Armor Class (AC) via the Dodge bonus.

SPD.name: Speed
mechanics: Primary factor in Initiative (determining turn order in combat).

VIT.name: Vitality
VIT.description: Hardiness, health, and resistance to physical ailments.
mechanics: Primary modifier for Hit Point (HP) Gain upon leveling.
Provides resistance bonus against Poison and Disease.

INT.name: Intelligence
INT.description: Mental acuity, memory, and arcane knowledge.
mechanics: Primary attribute for Arcane (Wizard/Mage) Spell Success Rate.
Determines bonus Arcane Spell Points (SP) and ability to learn complex spells.

PER.name: Personality
PER.description: Charm, persuasion, and outward social grace.
mechanics: Used for the success rate of Mind-Control Spells (as the caster).
Influences the effectiveness of social skills.

WIL.name: Willpower
WIL.description: Inner mental strength, devotion, and sheer stubbornness.
mechanics: Primary attribute for Divine (Priest/Druid) Spell Success Rate.
Provides the resistance bonus for Mental Saving Throws (against charm, fear, possession).
